p: EOs encapsulation also prevent the oxidative deterioration and loss of volatile compounds, in order to maintain their biological activities (e.g., antibacterial, antiviral, antifungal, anticancer, antidiabetic, anti-inflammatory, antioxidant, antiprotozoal, and insect-repellent), and their compositions after exposure to light, moisture, oxygen, and high temperature, and for easier handling and industrial processing [ 48].
